snippet: For a second consecutive day, Israel confronted fire along its border with Syria on Monday as the Israeli army said it fired shells toward the source of a mortar shell, hitting Syrian artillery units.

byline.contributor: Jodi Rudoren contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: For a second consecutive day, Israel confronted fire along its border with Syria on Monday as the Israeli army said it fired shells toward the source of a mortar shell, hitting Syrian artillery units.

headline.seo: Responding to Mortar Fire, Israel Strikes Syrian Artillery Units
headline.main: Israel Strikes at Syria Again in Response to Mortar Attacks
headline.print_headline: Responding to Mortar Fire, Israel Strikes Syrian Artillery Units

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
